description: Wraps a map-style dataset-like object as an instance of MapDataset, and equips itwith map and other utility methods. All non-magic methods of the raw objectare also accessible.

params.name: data
params.description: An object with __getitem__ and __len__ methods. It couldbe a list or a subclass of paddle.io.Dataset.

params.name: kwargs
params.description: Other information to be passed to the dataset.
